firewall.name: Disable_File_Sharing
firewall.command: netsh advfirewall firewall set rule group="File and Printer Sharing" new enable=No

firewall.name: RDP_Max_Security
firewall.desc: Maximizes the security of a Remote Desktop Connection

firewall.name: Enable_Firewall
firewall.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on

firewall.name: Block_All_Ports
firewall.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles firewallpolicy blockinboundalways,allowoutbound

firewall.name: Disable_ICMP_IPV4
firewall.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='ICMP Allow incoming V4 echo request' protocol=icmpv4:8,any dir=in action=allow

firewall.name: Disable_ICMP_IPV6
firewall.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='ICMP Allow incoming V6 echo request' protocol=icmpv6:8,any dir=in action=allow

firewall.name: Disable_Sending_Pass_SMB
firewall.desc: Some non-Microsoft SMB servers only support unencrypted (plain text) password authentication. Disable sending plain text passwords across the network, when authenticating to an SMB server, for increasing the overall security of the environment

firewall.name: Restrict_Shares_Access
firewall.desc: Network shares that can be accessed anonymously will not be allowed

firewall.name: Allow_Only_LMA
firewall.desc: The Kerberos v5 authentication protocol is the default for authentication for domains. NTLM which is less secure, is retained in later Windows versions for compatibility with standalone systems as well as applications that may still use it. Earlier versions of the LM/NTLM protocol are particularly vulnerable to attack and must be prevented.

user.name: Disable_NULL_Session
user.desc: Disable NTLM sessions that are allowed to fall back to Null (unauthenticated) sessions for preventing unauthorized access

user.name: Disable_The_Guest_Account
user.desc: Disable the guest accounts for preventing temporary login on a Windows system without requiring to provide credentials/password

user.name: Restrict_Permission_Anon_User
user.desc: Restrict the permissions of anonymous users

user.name: Require_Keys_For_Login
user.desc: Enable the Ctrl+Alt+Del keys to login

user.name: Disallow_Anon_Enum_Of_SAM
user.desc: Disallow anonymous logon users (null session connections) to list all account names and enumerate all shared resources

user.name: Prevent_Anon_SAM_Accounts
user.desc: Disallow anonymous logon users (null session connections) to list all account names for preventing a list of potential points to attack the system.

user.name: Prevent_Group_Policy_Refresh
user.desc: Set Group Policy settings not to be refreshed while a user is currently logged on

user.name: Config_Classic_Security_Model
user.desc: Protect the local accounts with the classic model

network.name: Disable_Lan_Hash_Value
network.desc: Disable storing the hash of the password in the LAN Manager

network.name: Network_Digitally_Sign_Communications
network.desc: Set the SMB client for only communicating with an SMB server that performs SMB packet signing

network.name: Prevent_Printing_Over_Http
network.desc: Configure the system to the prevent printing over HTTP

services.name: Prevent_Remote_Assistance
services.desc: Prevent unsolicited offers of help to the system
services.command: reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Terminal Services" /v fAllowUnsolicited  /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

services.name: NTFS_Update_Disable
services.desc: Disable the NTFS updates for extra performance out of the disk volumes

services.name: Machine_Inactivity_15_Min
services.desc: Set the screen saver at a maximum of 15 minutes

services.name: IPSec_Exemptions_Limited
services.desc: Configure the Windows to limit IPSec exemptions

services.name: WinExplorer_Heap_Corruption_Disable
services.desc: Disable the heap termination on corruption
services.command: reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Terminal Services" /v fAllowUnsolicited  /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

services.name: Remote_Logfiles_Generate
services.desc: Generate the log files on Remote Assistance
services.command: reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Terminal Services" /v LoggingEnabled /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f

services.name: SubSystem_Require_Case_Insensitivity
services.desc: Require the case insensitivity restrictions for preventing the access of files or commands that must be restricted

services.name: Safe_DLL_Search_Mode
services.desc: Search the %systemroot% for the DLL before searching the current directory or the rest of the path
